meanings.definition: The act of reading something again.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed my rereadings of the storybook.
meanings.sent2: Her rereadings of the novel helped her remember the plot.
meanings.sent3: His rereadings of the comic book always made him smile.
meanings.sent4: The rereadings of the poem revealed new meanings each time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged rereadings of the chapter for better comprehension.

meanings.definition: The process of going over a text multiple times for better understanding.
meanings.sent1: The student's rereadings of the textbook improved their grades.
meanings.sent2: Through rereadings of the instructions, she finally grasped the concept.
meanings.sent3: The rereadings of the recipe made him a master chef in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her rereadings of the map helped her navigate the city effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's rereadings of the research paper led to a breakthrough discovery.
